alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 300 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richmond West, or near The Redland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Miami Beach, Homestead, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, South Miami, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Virginia Key, Kendall, Doral, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, Florida City, West Miami, Westchester, Naranja and Glenvar Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
